salaryExpectations: Extremely variable, from LKR 0 to LKR 500,000+ per month, based on audience size and monetization.
futureOutlook: As a form of content creation, this is a growing field. Sri Lankan audiences are increasingly consuming local digital content. Success depends on finding a unique niche, creating high-quality content consistently, and building an engaged community. It is a highly competitive, entrepreneurial path that requires significant long-term effort before seeing financial returns.
